news.title: OBR head resigns over Budget day publishing error
news.summary: The government's official forecaster inadvertently published a crucial Budget document early.

news.title: Starmer says he is proud of Budget as he denies misleading public
news.summary: The Tories have accused the government of lying about the state of the public finances ahead of the Budget.

news.title: Doctors in England to stage five-day strike before Christmas
news.summary: Walkout in England begins on 17 December and will be 14th strike in pay dispute.

news.title: Tulip Siddiq MP says Bangladesh jail sentence is 'deeply unfair'
news.summary: The MP, and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, received a two-year sentence in her absence over corruption allegations.

news.title: US and UK agree zero tariffs deal on pharmaceuticals
news.summary: The deal follows threats of tariffs as high as 100% on branded drug imports.

news.title: Police consider corporate manslaughter charges in Post Office scandal
news.summary: The move comes as police continue to investigate what has been called the UK's most widespread miscarriage of justice.

news.title: Regulator backtracks on Manchester to London 'ghost train' plan
news.summary: Plans to ban passengers from the peak train service between Manchester and London are abandoned.

news.title: Global shortage of obesity jabs, warns WHO
news.summary: Too few people who could benefit from so-called "skinny jabs" are able to access them, says WHO.

news.title: Trump releases fraudster executive days into prison sentence
news.summary: The former investment manager was convicted of defrauding thousands of investors.

news.title: Car-sharing company ZipCar to end UK operations
news.summary: ZipCar, which has more than 600,000 UK members, temporarily suspends new bookings on its platform.
